mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CinePick_Movies (title, description, release_date, duration, genre, director, cast) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{releaseDate}, #{duration}, #{genre}, #{director}, #{cast})
mapper.update: UPDATE CinePick_Movies SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, release_date = #{releaseDate}, duration = #{duration}, genre = #{genre}, director = #{director}, cast = #{cast}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE movie_id = #{movieId}
mapper.select: SELECT movie_id AS movieId, title, poster FROM CinePick_Movies WHERE title LIKE #{title} LIMIT 1
